properties.headline: Evacuation - Immediate issued January 30 at 2:48PM CST by NWS Norman OK
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE
WOODWARD COUNTY EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT.

A HYDROGEN CHLORIDE GAS LEAK HAS OCCURRED AT THE DEEPWATER
CHEMICAL FACILITY NEAR THE WOODWARD AIRPORT. THE WOODWARD COUNTY
EMERGENCY MANAGER HAS REQUESTED THAT RESIDENTS EVACUATE THE AREA
NEAR THE WOODWARD AIRPORT. THE EVACUATION EXTENDS NORTHWARD ONE
MILE TO COUNTY ROAD 40. RESIDENTS WITHIN THE AREA BETWEEN THE
AIRPORT AND COUNTY ROAD 40 SHOULD LEAVE THE AREA HEADED EITHER
NORTH ALONG HIGHWAY 196 OR IN AN EAST/WEST DIRECTION AWAY FROM
THE AIRPORT.
properties.instruction:
LOCAL OFFICIALS HAVE REQUESTED THE IMMEDIATE EVACUATION OF THE
AREA. PLEASE LISTEN AND RESPOND TO ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FROM
LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT.
